smp = 50;
R0 = rot([1;0;0], pi/4);
[x, y, z] = path_sine([-0.15; -0.2; 2.6], R0, [0.15; 0.3; 0], smp);
rs = [x; y; z];
qs = nan(4, smp);
for smp_idx = 1: smp
    Rc = expm(up_hat([1;0;0]) * (-(z(smp_idx)-2.6)./max(z-2.6).*10+8)/180*pi);
    qs(:, smp_idx) = rot2q(R0 * Rc);
end



cost = 88.4116
